name: foredoomed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of planned activities) going to fail, or extremely unlucky from the beginning: foredoomed to The whole project seemed foredoomed to failure from the start.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
resulting in bad things happening by chanceunluckyAn unlucky bounce led to the winning goal against the home team.unfortunateNo one was to blame - it was just an unfortunate accident.ill-fatedSeven crew members were killed on the ill-fated voyage.ill-starredHis ill-starred reign began with a famine and ended with civil war.
